title: Ascension says recent data breach affects over 430,000 patients
summary: Ascension, one of the largest private healthcare systems in the United States, has revealed that the personal and healthcare information of over 430,000 patients was exposed in a data breach disclosed last month. [...]

title: Google Chrome to use on-device AI to detect tech support scams
summary: Google is implementing a new Chrome security feature that uses the built-in 'Gemini Nano' large-language model (LLM) to detect and block tech support scams while browsing the web. [...]

title: Police dismantles botnet selling hacked routers as residential proxies
summary: Law enforcement authorities have dismantled a botnet that infected thousands of routers over the last 20 years to build two networks of residential proxies known as Anyproxy and 5socks. [...]

title: BREAKING: 7,000-Device Proxy Botnet Using IoT, EoL Systems Dismantled in U.S. - Dutch Operation
summary:
A joint law enforcement operation undertaken by Dutch and U.S. authorities has dismantled a criminal proxy network that's powered by thousands of infected Internet of Things (IoT) and end-of-life (EoL) devices, enlisting them into a botnet for providing anonymity to malicious actors.

title: OtterCookie v4 Adds VM Detection and Chrome, MetaMask Credential Theft Capabilities
summary:
The North Korean threat actors behind the Contagious Interview campaign have been observed using updated versions of a cross-platform malware called OtterCookie with capabilities to steal credentials from web browsers and other files.

title: Chinese hackers behind attacks targeting SAP NetWeaver servers
summary: Forescout Vedere Labs security researchers have linked ongoing attacks targeting a maximum severity vulnerability impacting SAP NetWeaver instances to a Chinese threat actor. [...]

title: Germany takes down eXch cryptocurrency exchange, seizes servers
summary: The Federal police in Germany (BKA) seized the server infrastructure and shut down the 'eXch' cryptocurrency exchange platform for alleged money laundering cybercrime proceeds. [...]

title: Initial Access Brokers Target Brazil Execs via NF-e Spam and Legit RMM Trials
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers are warning of a new campaign that's targeting Portuguese-speaking users in Brazil with trial versions of commercial remote monitoring and management (RMM) software since January 2025.

title: Deploying AI Agents? Learn to Secure Them Before Hackers Strike Your Business
summary:
AI agents are changing the way businesses work. They can answer questions, automate tasks, and create better user experiences. But with this power comes new risks — like data leaks, identity theft, and malicious misuse.

title: Malicious npm Packages Infect 3,200+ Cursor Users With Backdoor, Steal Credentials
summary:
